entries.femaleVariant: Everyone who's anyone in Night City'll be there – on my yacht.
<kiroshi l="rus" o="Ты можешь нормально сказать, врал он или нет?" t="Come on, don't leave me hanging. Did he lie or not?" b="" a=""/>
Those girls... I dunno, man, that got pretty rough...
They're top-of-the-line dolls. They will remember nothing.
Rule number one – nothin' surprises you, don't let it.
This has to be spotless. Enough for me to wanna lick it. Got it?
If the customer wants white truffles, then white truffles he'll get! Not black, not blue! White!
If those cocksuckers out there can demand shit just 'cause they're paying, then so can I!
You can rest up tomorrow, when it's all over. That is, unless they decide to stay...
Good evening.
Evenin'.
Evenin'.
Whatcha got?
Baby?! Let's start over, with your name, maybe.
entries.maleVariant: Kiddo?! Let's start over, with your name, maybe.

entries.femaleVariant: I'm good, thanks.
Let's see whatcha got.
O' course.
I'm good, thanks.
Come back anytime.
And when I say heads're gonna roll, I don't mean it as a fucking turn of phrase.
What'll affect everyone?
Bartender's right – you've had enough.
What's gonna slap everyone?
You wanna know what a bearer of bad news looks like?
Barkeep's right, you've had your fill for today.
Fuck, it's that guy from the bar... He was right.
Hey, familiar face! Konpeki Plaza bar? I remember you!
<kiroshi l="rus" o="А ты сама как думаешь?" t="What do you think?" b="" a=""/>
<kiroshi l="rus" o="Я думаю, что не врал. По крайней мере, насчёт «Кан тао»." t="I think he told the truth. At least as regards Kang Tao." b="" a=""/>
<kiroshi l="rus" o="Зая, ты же помнишь, как мы тестировали эту технику на наших." t="Sweetheart… Surely you remember the tech, the tests we did on our people?" b="" a=""/>
<kiroshi l="rus" o="То есть он тоже? Охренеть. Он так натурально смеялся." t="So this guy, too? The son-of-a-bitch! But that laugh of his – so very authentic!" b="" a=""/>
<kiroshi l="rus" o="А вот его мозговые волны вообще не смеялись." t="His brain waves did not laugh, not at all." b="" a=""/>
What about me?! I'll sure as shit remember!
Shit... Why'd I have to go gawkin' in there?
Still... you wish you made in one month what they make in one night.
Some rich bitch lets all her dogs jump in the pool, you don't ask no questions, you don't stare, you don't fucking bother me.
Guest makes his room look like a storm went through it…
I don't ask no questions, I don't stare, I don't fucking bother you.
Hey, you a quick study, I like that. A guest's kids want to throw a TV out the window – same thing, you watch it happen.
What if they want to throw another person out the window?
Then you can fucking bother me, but do it fucking discreetly.
Anna? Why is she in Night City?
She's promoting her new movie. Already raked two billion at the box office, apparently…
You know I suggested that to her, gave her the idea? The whole spherical ziggurat thing?
Had enough, guy – don'tcha think? Makin' the other customer's uncomfortable.
Good! 'Cause this affects them, too! It'll slap everyone in the face!
Hm. Guess so. 'Sides, what's a man s'posed to do?
I'm gonna get some sleep...
Don't have time for this, sorry.
Sure, but any later'll be too late.
Keep it down. You're talking about Saburo Arasaka's daughter.
Keep it down. Emperor's daughter you're talking about.
Big deal.
Big deal.
Don't have time for this.
Shit... you could be right.
Don't know how big just yet...
Got the wrong girl.
Nope, got it wrong.
Sure, I remember you.
I remember you, too.
C'mon, don't remember me? Arasaka's aircraft carrier...? I was pretty wasted…
Welp, there's your answer…
Where's my answer?
You were wasted.
Shit, you could be right. Sorry, musta confused things…
Must've gotten out at the last minute. Later, it was a bloodbath…
Woulda been a goner if it wasn't for you…
I owe you one.
All the more reason you should come, then. As a... coinitiator of her rise, her success. Just leave your iron at home.
Pff. Fuck you.
No, no, no, you listen. I can let the Cuba thing slide, but not Nairobi.
Fahrida, I didn't have anything to do with...
You did. You're turning the city into a goddamn neurovirus test tube – that's hurting my investments.
And when my bottom line's hit, I hit the market. Maybe toss a few bombs here and there, shake it up. Is that what you want?
Um, I, no, uh... I could... Could relocate the factories... How much time do I have?
As long as it takes me to finish my drink. And I drink fast, so you'd better grab that phone.
Rachel Zaccaria?!
The one and only.
How were you able to seduce the world's most expensive model?
I did not seduce her.
I kidnapped her. Right after the Buenos-Six show.
Well aren't you the romantic... And Zaccaria? How did she react?
I am certain I can convince her over supper.
And should she not, I will send her home by plane tonight.
Spongin' up booze in a bar and mouthin' off for everyone to hear – think that's a good idea?
Keep it up. Sure it'll work out great for ya.
Even your ex confirmed. She's gonna be there.
You'll never guess who I was driving today.
The mayor.
Yeah? So what?
What do you mean, "so what?"
Yesterday I cruised around with Tina Caruso, head of Biotechnica's West Coast branch.
Second car was for her personal physiotherapist...
Third car was for her puma.
Her puma?
S'right, the one that went extinct. Reintroduced it to match the color of her dress.
So anyway, the mayor... Yeah, tha'ss big.
Marvelous! Did... did you put something in my drink?
You're welcome.
So that's why I feel so... so... hehe…
That is just the beginning. In a short while all sensations will be ten times stronger...
Especially pain.
"P-pain," you said?
I'd like to try something different today. Is that OK with you?
Yeah... Yeah, absolutely.
A private jet from Seattle... Chic, very, and appreciated even more. It must have cost a pretty enny.
You are worth the price.
A Bosch, a Manet, two Basquiat miniatures, nothing but classics…
All sucked out of into the empty void of space through a hole in the station's body.
Bloody hell... What'll become of the gallery?
Oh, but it was all planned! The focus of the whole opening!
Wait, wait... allow me to venture a guess... A new Abramovsky?
Mhm. "Untitled number three." It's a reckoning with... Oh, I can't remember. God, I think.
Sounds ambitious. How much did it cost?
The gratitude of an artist of his stature is worth more.
How do you feel?
What's four hundred yards long, weighs a hundred thousand tons, and is nuclear powered...? The answer's docked in the bay.
What can I get ya, baby?
entries.maleVariant: What can I get ya, kiddo?

entries.femaleVariant: You always this forward?
Baby?!
You always this forward?
You're full of shit...
Cool story, bro.
Nah, you're full of shit...
Cool story, choom. Too bad it's made-up.
Uhh...
Well... that'd make two of us, now, wouldn't it?
What ever made you think I work here?
Hmm... you're standin' in front of me?
Hmm... You got any idea who owns Konpeki Plaza?
No.
Strangest thing – nobody knows. S'like they're a ghost.
But whoever it is, they like to keep things bright, shinin', and sparklin' here.
Maybe, just maybe, they're so concerned about the quality of service, they sometimes moonlight as the bartender?
Suckled it outta my ma's very breast.
Fitty percent protein, the other half pure high octane CHOOH2.
Uhh... what?
She had wind and dust in her hair, so to speak.
Belonged to the Aldecaldos. Before the bombs began fallin'.
Her final words? "Wherever you go, whatever you do, be yourself, David."
And so I ended up here. Still no one but myself.
Everyone's making something up. Just like you, baby.
entries.maleVariant: Everyone's making something up. Just like you, kiddo.

entries.femaleVariant: Can I getcha somethin'? At the least… water?
How 'bout your name first? Wanna make sure your supervisor hears about this.
Hanako Arasaka decided – hiccup! – decided to take a little vacation!
Know what? Gonna go and do just that!
Good. In that case, be at the room in fifteen minutes. Cover the mirrors and camera.
Uh-huh... Why would they do that?
Dunno... to keep a proprietor's eye on things? Maybe rake in some tips?
And by the time we do, it'll--... it'll be too late.
Screw this.
Walk away. Do it while you still can.
Hahaha!
Hey.
Hey.
We meet again, baby. What're ya havin'?
entries.maleVariant: We meet again, kiddo. What're ya havin'?

entries.femaleVariant: Embargo? How does that fucking concern me?
The garage I mentioned – there I have twenty late model Daikani, ten containers of armor-piercing ammunition and a full ton of antipersonnel mines.
Fix the situation or the transports will go to the Soviets, the Zero Syndicate or I'll just drop them straight out of orbit!
But first I will make certain they all drive over your lazy ass! Do you know why? Because Hajime Taki always fulfills his contracts, always!
And if I promised the Kurds they would have the Daikani to help them in their negotiations with Petrochem, then the smoke from those fucking biofarms will sting eyes in Night City!
Mhm... Better, that's the idea, Minister. Finally a stance we expect for your money.
Well, you certainly put him in his place.
Mhm. Now where are those Militech bastards? They're next. I detest delays.
Please give my best to your charming wife.

<kiroshi l="rus" o="Про заражение под Новоиркутском они врали, про аварию на «Бакунинской-3», врали. Они всегда врут." t="The New Irkutsk Oblast chemical contamination? They lied. The Bakunin Three explosion? They lied. They always lie." b="" a=""/>
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="今のままじゃ、ブレインダンスはダメだと思うんだよな。単純な表現しかできてないから" t="Thus far, the biggest problem with braindance has been its expressive limitations – the scrolls are too simplistic." b="" a=""/>

<kiroshi l="jpn" o="笑いといえばコメディだし、恐怖はホラーだし、恋愛はラブロマンスじゃん？ ジャンル映画の方法を使ってるだけでしょう？" t="Laughter means comedy, horror means fear, and romance means love and passion. It's the same as movies that rely on genre tropes." b="" a=""/>

<kiroshi l="jpn" o="感情表現って、そうじゃないんじゃないかな？ だから、いま、東京のチームと実験をしてるんだよ" t="There is more to capturing emotions than that, which is what my research team in Tokyo is currently working toward achieving." b="" a=""/>

<kiroshi l="jpn" o="たとえば、嬉しいけど、もの哀しいとか、落ち着いてるけど、何か不安を感じるとか。そういう感覚ってあるでしょう？" t="Take, for example, the feeling when you combine happiness and melancholy, or being calm with an underlying sense of anxiety." b="" a=""/>
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="人間の感情がもっと豊かな作品を創ろうと思ってね" t="I want my productions to convey real, raw human emotion." b="" a=""/>
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="はい、なんです？" t="Yes, what is it?" b="" a=""/>
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="新しい企画のオファー？" t="Did you bring a pitch for me?" b="" a=""/>
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="僕の作品、知ってるの？" t="You know my work?" b="" a=""/>
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="ああ、すいません。いま、時間ないんで" t="Apologies, I simply do not have time for this now." b="" a=""/>
Hey.
<kiroshi l="jpn" o="僕はリアルを感じてもらいたいんだよ。もちろん、現実には体験できない物語を通してね" t="These complex, realistic feelings and emotions are what I aspire to recreate… woven into much better stories, of course." b="" a=""/>
Hey.
